description:
Seto is the number 1 member of the Blindfold group and is often portrayed as the "nice guy" of the group.
His ability is "Steal". He can read the mind of people within eye contact. As shown in the anime, he is also able to focus and read people`s minds in a large distances too. However he himself dislikes his ability and rarely uses it because "It`ll make Communication redundant". However this made him to posses an enigmatic personality in the inside while being extremely nice and energetic on the outside to the point that only Kano and Kido seem to be able to understand his true desires.
Just like the other members of the group, he acquired her ability after having a near death experience. As a child, he had communication problems and his timid nature made him the center of the bullies. Being unable to make friends, he considered an abondand dog as his buddy. On a stormy night, the bully kids at the street tried to bother him by throwing his dog into the river. Seto dives in to save his dog. After drawning, he and his dog were caught in the void space (Heat Haze). Seto managed to escape while leaving his dog behind.
Tateyama Family later adopted him along with Kano and Kido.
His ability and him being unable to control it made him try to suicide once, when he met Marry at his suicide scene and recruited her.
Its hinted that his attachment to Marry is for his interest in cute, petit and fluffy things.
His song is: Shounen Brave (The Brave Boy) which tells the story of his past.
name: Seto Kousuke
